price: (15) And as for those who had believed and done righteous deeds, they will be in a garden [of Paradise], delighted.
arabic: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ فَهُمۡ فِي رَوۡضَةٖ يُحۡبَرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-ammā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti fahum fī rawḍatin yuḥ'barūna
